column4: good morning (i'm in italy) .... someone knows the way to install canon lbp5100 on ubuntu 11.10. After upgrade the printer don't print.

but if i delete the print sitch it off and after on
the system install the prinetr

your only problem is that you have to switch it on and off every time to make it work, correct?

correct

lbp5100 canon
